oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Carl W. Holt correspondence with the Chattanoga News Free Press, 1955 November 17
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Holt, Carl W.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter to the editor of a Chattanooga, Tennessee newspaper, chastising the newspaper for fomenting dissent against the Chattanooga School Board's decision to integrate the public schools.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga News Free Press; Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Chattanooga Board of Education correspondence and memoranda, 1955-1957
Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1953-1961
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Raymond B. Witt Chattanooga Public Schools desegregation records
